title: Kreation Juicery
description: Opened in fall summer 2011, this little juicery is attached/next door to their cafe, Kreation Kafe. Mostly organic, extensive juices and smoothies menu. Pre-pressed juices are stored in fridge case for grab-n-go; or you can request custom vegetable juice blend. Bee and dairy products used, so vegans to specify when ordering smoothies & acai.
